PropertiesÂ¶

Each property inherits from this class. If values need to be set, each property has its own setValues() , and it should be defined for new properties.

Each property is created by a Factory. These are the existing properties and factories:

  • Colors
    • Color Property
    • Color Factory
    • Color utilities
  • Curvature
    • Curvature Property
    • Curvature Factory
  • Eigen Property
  • Normals
    • Normals Property
    • Normals Factory
  • Neighborhood
    • Point Neighborhood
    • Neighbors Property
    • Neighbors Factory
  • Panorama
    • Panorama Property
    • Panorama Factory
  • Saliency
    • Saliency Property
    • Saliency Factory
  • Segmentation Property
  • Spherical Coordinates
    • Spherical Property
    • SphericalCoordinates Factory
  • Transformations
    • Transformation Matrix Property
    • Transformation Matrix Factory
